@xHighTower Incredibly easy to do
@xHighTower Australia was one of the official releases before it was pulled due to the encrypted SD card speed issue
@xHighTower Yes official Australian release. Very simply with flashtool app

@DanRockNZ @JudithCollinsMP Smartfuel has driven up national price to accommodate instant discounts. It's why such deals were banned in AU.
@ianapperley @paulbrislen fuel prices are inflated because of AA Smartfuel. AA are in denial.
@JudithCollinsMP a max of 4cpl for the very same reasons the ACCC did. Importer margin is high to allow for discounting which is wrong.
@JudithCollinsMP Please do something about petrol discounting. AA smartfuel should be banned. We need to follow AU and limit discounting to
Successfully completed #dryjanuary didn't have a single @FlyAirNZ flight all month. First month plane free since early 2014!

@BenRoss_AKL @moylea you will fly NZ metal from NZ and then connect via SIN or elsewhere

@BenRoss_AKL @moylea cheaper to fly via NZ to SIN/HKG/PVG/YVR and onward on partner airlines than NZ metal all the way now.
@BenRoss_AKL @moylea Vast majority of NZ ticketed pax on NZ 086 ticket stock flying to LHR don't fly NZ metal all the way anyway. It's
@BenRoss_AKL @moylea @FlyAirNZ and NZ wouldn't give up LAX to LHR due to demand from US pax
@BenRoss_AKL @moylea @FlyAirNZ 2nd landing slot at LHR has been leased out so that can't happen either.
@BenRoss_AKL @moylea @FlyAirNZ Yes. That would make the situation even worse and unlikely to happen.
